testsuite.name: CarSharingTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #6
Can't find 'Super company' company in the COMPANY table.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -databaseFileName carsharing
1. Log in as a manager 0. Exit > 1
1. Company list 2. Create a company 0. Back > 1
The company list is empty!
1. Company list 2. Create a company 0. Back > 2
Enter the company name: > Super company
1. Company list 2. Create a company 0. Back > 1
Company list: 1. Super company
1. Company list 2. Create a company 0. Back
